name: Drummer Runner
description:
Made in 1 week

Pluck your courage and batter your friends in a one wing race to be the clucking best. Winner winner chicken dinner!!

Drummer Runner is a local coop party game where you use sexy leg combat to knock each other off the level. It is up to 4 players but also includes a single player mode where you evade eggs that fall from the sky.  Controllers are required to play the multiplayer mode. 

Developed by myself - UI Artist, Tech Artist
Adam Young - Level Designer, Environment Artist
Luke White - Programmer
